comments.body:

or

What makes choice observers special here? Shouldnâ€™t the node itself be disclosed via `discloseNode` above just like for observers on a consuming choice?

The node is already disclosed above: choice observers are _informees_ of a node.
But in addition, the contract-ids must be divulged.
Oh because choice observers are not stakeholders so they might not know the contract. Makes sense, thanks!
